name: Postgres Trigger
natural_language_description: 这是 Postgres Trigger 节点。主要用于: Listens to Postgres messages

triggerMode.name: triggerMode
triggerMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Listen For | 默认值: createTrigger
available_options: Table Row Change Events (值: createTrigger) - Insert, update or delete
Advanced (值: listenTrigger) - Listen to existing Postgres channel

schema.name: schema
schema.natural_language_description: 参数名: Schema Name | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': 'public'} | (必填项)

tableName.name: tableName
tableName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table Name | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

channelName.name: channelName
channelName.description: Name of the channel to listen to
channelName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Channel Name | 作用: Name of the channel to listen to | (必填项)

firesOn.name: firesOn
firesOn.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event to listen for | 默认值: INSERT

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: channelName (值: None) - Name of the channel to listen to
functionName (值: None) - Name of the function to create
replaceIfExists (值: None) - Whether to replace an existing function and trigger with the same name
triggerName (值: None) - Name of the trigger to create

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: connectionTimeout (值: None) - Number of seconds reserved for connecting to the database
delayClosingIdleConnection (值: None) - Number of seconds to wait before idle connection would be eligible for closing
